item.description:
Hello fellow members of the Greater Boston Internet Marketing Meetup.

On October 2nd at 1:30 pm BIMM will conduct an on-air broadcast reporting live from three different locations.

Our objective is to give you, the viewer, the chance to see a Google Hangout in action and to give you all a sense of how easily you can use this FREE TOOL to expand your internet marketing prowess.

The only way to participate is to tune into YOUTUBE and watch the less than 30 minute presentation and shoot us messages via twitter @BOSTIMM  or #Bostimm  or email keithspiro@kendall-press.com during the meetup

If you are a registered GOOGLE PLUS (g+) user - you can look for keith at Kendall PRess or Bruce Jones BJ Design and the top entry at 1:30pm will be BIMM TUESDAY GROUP.  Click and watch our brief demonstration of this powerful and free tool.

We will also have a short roundtable where Lew, Bruce and Keith will present their TOP TIP for how to overcome any fear of broadcasting.

Please do tune in and engage us with twitter or email during the broadcast.

Our next regular live and in-person MEETUP is scheduled for Weds Oct 17th.

You will have a chance at the Oct 17th meetup to create your own 30 day challenge to put out a live broadcast on the internet for fun and profit.
item.how_to_find_us: This will be an ONLINE MEETUP. Tune in on You Tube or if you are on g+ look up BJ Design see below
item.name: Internet Marketing Meetup's Thirty Day Challenge - GOOGLE HANGOUT ON AIR
